attributes.action: euro price fuel for the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: reduce fuel to EU prices( 1 Euro a liter = 72 - 75p )!  when the price of oil goes up the by the barrel the government get more revenue from it,this should be offset against pump prices, simple set fuel at 75p a liter if oil goes up reduce the tax. if oil goes down, put up the tax, but keep the price steady thus keeping inflation low and help companies stay competative
